projectData.title: QRico (Restaurant ERP)
projectData.description: A self-service ordering system with real-time updates and custom menu editor.
projectData.fullDescription:
Key features include:

- Multi-tenant restaurant management system.
- Dynamic menu creation with nested options and allergens.
- Real-time order notifications through WebSockets.
- Table layout editor and zone management.
- Staff and role management with fine-grained access control.
- Secure cloud deployment with serverless architecture.

projectData.title: CPB Medical ERP
projectData.description: ERP for medical equipment sales, inventory tracking, and workflow automation.
projectData.fullDescription:
Key features include:

- Comprehensive inventory and equipment tracking.
- Automated sales and order management workflows.
- Role-based access control for employees and admins.
- Detailed reporting and analytics for business decisions.
- Seamless integration with cloud services for reliability and scalability.
- User-friendly interface for efficient daily operations.

projectData.title: Group Chat App
projectData.description: A real-time group messaging platform built with Express.js, featuring live chat rooms, user management, and a simple clean interface using raw HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projectData.fullDescription:
Key features include:

- Create and manage group chats with ease.
- Generate one-time use invite codes for secure access.
- Assign or remove admin roles within groups.
- Kick or remove members when needed.
- Simple interface focused on group collaboration.
